fields.label: Task
fields.options:
Dusting surfaces, including furniture, shelves, and decorative items.
Vacuuming carpets, rugs, upholstery, and floors.
Mopping hard floors like tile, laminate, and hardwood.
Emptying trash cans and replacing liners.
Sanitizing and disinfecting high-touch surfaces.
Cleaning and disinfecting toilets.
Cleaning showers and bathtubs, removing soap scum and mildew.
Cleaning sinks, countertops, and mirrors in bathrooms.
Cleaning kitchen countertops, backsplashes, and sinks.
Cleaning exterior appliance surfaces and the inside of microwaves.
Cleaning stovetops.
Sweeping and mopping kitchen floors.
Cleaning interior and exterior windows.
Performing deep cleaning tasks, such as cleaning inside ovens, refrigerators, and cabinets.
Carpet cleaning.
Organization services.
Changing bed linens, and sometimes washing and folding laundry.
